Sentencas: The crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of the solid solution Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 for 0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.8 were investigated.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: All compositions had the GdFeO3-type orthorhombic perovskite structure.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The lattice parameters were determined at room temperature by X-ray powder diffraction (XRPD).
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The pseudo-cubic lattice constant decreased continuously with x.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The average linear thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) in the temperature range from 573 to 973 K was found to increase with x.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The thermal expansion curves for all values of x displayed rapid increase in slope at high temperatures.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity increased with x for the entire temperature range of measurement.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The calculated activation energy values indicate that electrical conduction takes place primarily by the small polaron hopping mechanism.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The charge compensation for the divalent ion on the A-site is provided by the formation of Fe4+ ions on the B-site (in preference to Co4+ ions) and vacancies on the oxygen sublattice for low values of x. The large increase in the conductivity with x in the range from 0.6 to 0.8 is attributed to the substitution of Fe4+ ions by Co4+ ions.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The Fe site has a lower small polaron site energy than Co and hence behaves like a carrier trap, thereby drastically reducing the conductivity.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)

Sentencas: The non-linear behaviour in the dependence of log sigmaT with reciprocal temperature can be attributed to the generation of additional charge carriers with increasing temperature by the charge disproportionation of Co3+ ions.
Titulo: Crystal structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of Nd0.7Sr0.3Fe1-xCoxO3 (0≤x≤0.8)
